alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 04 at 6:54AM EST until March 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph, with the highest winds along the eastern slopes of the Allegheny Front. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, eastern West Virginia, and the Blue Ridge Mountains and Highland County in Virginia. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett
